themes: Need for general operating funding over project-based funding
Recognition and support for nationally reputable organizations
Complexity and burden of the funding application process
Overly critical and harsh public review panels
Balancing accountability with accessibility in funding processes
key_phrases: Funding arts orgs for the work they do, not for a new program they have to create in order to get the funding
giving general operating funding to orgs that are nationally reputable, recognized organizations that put Austin on the map
Balancing need for accountability/organizational fit for funding with an application process that is complex, overwhelming, and burdensome
publicly posted review panels that are overly critical and, to be honest, outright mean to some orgs
barriers_identified: Requirement to create new programs to access funding
Complex, overwhelming, and burdensome application process
Overly critical and mean review panels
solutions_proposed: Provide general operating funding rather than only project-based funding
Balance accountability with a less burdensome application process
